de.take_weiland.mods.commons.asm.proxy

Class ProxyInterfaceRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.take_weiland.mods.commons.asm.proxy.ProxyInterfaceRegistry

  • public final class ProxyInterfaceRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    A central place to register your ProxyInterfaces.
    A ProxyInterface is an Interface that will be applied to a class using ASM.
    Getters and Setters for fields can be automatically created using the @Getter and @Setter annotations.
    Author:
    diesieben07

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void registerProxyInterface(java.lang.Class<?> proxy)
      Register a new ProxyInterface
      Given class has to be an interface and have the @TargetClass annotation.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • registerProxyInterface

        public static void registerProxyInterface(java.lang.Class<?> proxy)
        Register a new ProxyInterface
        Given class has to be an interface and have the @TargetClass annotation.
        This method should most likely be called from an IFMLCallHook
        Parameters:
        proxy - the interface class to register
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the class is not an interface
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the class doesn't have a @TargetClass annotation
